name: Divine Intervention
description:
Blocky is a block head. He places all his faith to you. It's up to you to lead him home.... or you could drop him into the Abyss, after all you are divine intervention.

(What's the word to describe someone who places all his faith to higher power and does nothing?)

Game made for GMTK 2018 Theme: GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC.

In this game, you play a PLATFORMER, but you can't MOVE.

Controls: Drag to move platforms

Credits: Game Developed by Akusan

Assets used: from Unity Asset Store
CARLOS WILKES - Lean Touch
RULE OF FUN - Easy Front End

from Open Game Art:
Enchanted Festival by Matthew Pablo
One by Pheonton

I hope you had fun. Please leave feedback ^_^
